```{r}
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
```

# Just inner joining companyname and id of title table. Seeing if it works. 
```{r}
SELECT *
FROM company_name
JOIN title
ON company_name.id = title.id
WHERE country_code = '[us]';
```

#inner joining title and movie kind. Sequels. 
```{r}
SELECT DISTINCT title.id, movie_id, title, kind_id, link_type_id
FROM imdb.title
JOIN movie_link
ON title.id = movie_link.movie_id
WHERE (kind_id = '1') 
AND (link_type_id = '1' OR link_type_id = '2'); 
```

#Finding Remakes
```{r}
SELECT DISTINCT title.id, movie_id, title, kind_id, link_type_id
FROM imdb.title
JOIN movie_link
ON title.id = movie_link.movie_id
WHERE kind_id = 1
AND (link_type_id = 3 OR link_type_id = 4); 
```

#Finding Reboots
